com.thale.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thale.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player:
    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth Description: A character in the game. There are multiple characters per game. When your playable character dies, you take control of another in your group. You can also switch to playing another character at any time. Each character has a different name and statistics.
